document_data.caption: The patriarch of the Uskevren family.
document_data.name: Thamalon Uskevren
document_data.mainbody: '''Thamalon Uskevren''' was the patriarch of the [[Sembia]]n noble family, [[House Uskevren]] of [[Selgaunt]], during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/273/Rogues Gallery: The Heroes of Stormweather|73}}
document_data.Activities:
Thamalon enjoyed literature of all kinds and possessed a vast collection of chapbooks and other small [[book|tome]]s that were gathered from all across [[Faer√ªn]].

He had a considerable interest in the [[Elven Court]] and the glory that was ancient [[Myth Drannor]].

In addition to his other pastimes, Thamalon was an avid vintner and over the years had developed a number of successful wines including ''[[Usk's Fine Old]]'', ''[[Thamalon's Own]]'' and ''[[Storm Ruby]]''.
document_data.Relationships: He was married to [[Shamur Uskevren|Shamur]] with whom he had three children: [[Thamalon Uskevren II|Thamalon II]], [[Thazienne Uskevren|Thazienne]], and [[Talbot Uskevren|Talbot]].
